name: Complete Me - Tangram Puzzles
description:
Relax and enjoy Classic Tangrams challenge of fitting wooden pieces into a silhouette shape. Exercise your mind with hundreds of unique hand-crafted puzzles. Great fun for all ages!

Complete Me is a simple and addictive puzzle game that involves dragging and rotating wooden pieces from a top tray and fitting them into a silhouette shape at the bottom. Puzzles range in difficulty from Beginner to Advanced and are a great way to train your brain and keep you mentally fit everyday.

Features:

* Hundreds of hand-crafted puzzles
* Puzzles of various difficulty levels (Beginner to Advanced)
* Helpful Solution Hints are available if needed
* Unlockable wooden puzzle themes!
* No time limits, no gimmicks, and no pressure - just relax and play
* No trees were harmed in the making of this game!

Support and Feedback:

If you have any technical problems please email us at support@romanapps.com. Please include the app's version, your device information (iOS version) and a screenshot if possible.
